acs.title: Coupang Digital VI System â€“ Apple Care Service (ACS)
acs.desc:
ACS (Apple Care Service) is a service that allows customers who purchase Apple devices on Coupang to pay for the existing one-time insurance product, Apple Care+, through a monthly subscription plan.
This reduces the initial cost burden and aims to attract more customers.
The service architecture is designed to be expandable beyond Apple Care+, enabling support for other device warranty and insurance products in the future.
features: Digital product subscription management and term-based subscription tracking
Registration and modification of payment methods for subscriptions
Subscription status management via the admin page
Development and operation of API, interface, and batch processes
role: Frontend Development: Implemented PC/Mobile Web and WebView UI (Next.js, React)

BFF Server Maintenance & Testing: Conducted stability testing, bug fixes, issue resolution for external/internal service integrations, and performance monitoring of the existing Kotlin-based API server
Operations/Deployment: Built monitoring environment (Grafana) and handled incident response
Performance Optimization: Improved response times through caching and query optimization
